title: AFDKO 2.0 Auto Hinting
content:
Hi all,  
When using the auto hint macro is it normal to get along list of corrections in the output window.

Are these corrections the macro has made, or are these corrections I need to make. I ask because if I run the macro again on the same font I still get the list of corrections, so I’m sort of thinking the corrections haven’t been made.  
c.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014050156im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture_6581.jpg)
author: coop

comments.content:
\> _When using the auto hint macro is it normal to get along list of corrections in the output window._

Yes, if you are running in "Verbose Mode". To change the Autohint preferences, hold the Ctrl key while you click on the Play button.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014050156im_/http:/typophile.com/files/AH_prefs_4876.png)

\> _Are these corrections the macro has made, or are these corrections I need to make._

The macro won't make any changes to the outlines, unless you allow it (not recommended). You can think of it as a report of suggestions. For example, seems like you've setup a standard stem with the value 57. When the autohint macro finds outlines where the stems are not exactly that value, it flags a near miss.

<cite>For example, seems like you’ve setup a standard stem with the value 57. When the autohint macro finds outlines where the stems are not exactly that value, it flags a near miss.</cite>

Yes, and I also noticed that this doesn‘t have to mean that there is actually someting that need to be corrected.

In this example, the Autohinter is telling me that it’s a near miss between 665 and 700. This is the place where i want my outline to bend a little bit - and that makes it different from the standard stem width. It’s a inner shape of a capital D, that is supposed to be there. The autohinter is giving me the exact position where this occurs – the curve begins at 35 and then eventually goes up to 34.

And in this case 34 is a standard stem width.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014050156im_/http:/typophile.com/files/autohint_dee_4065.png)
